actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide an exclusion from gross income for certain per diem received by State legislators.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from gross income per diem allowances received by State legislators. Limits such exclusion to 110 percent of the daily amount allowable for Federal employees away from home but serving in the United States.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide an exclusion from gross income for certain per diem received by State legislators.
